title: Sayonara, Enari-kun
overview: Dreaming of pure love, Kiriyama Saori meets an ikemen company president, Shimotsuke Kura, at a match-making party.She agrees to a platonic relationship with him. But Kura limits their dates to 2 hours each time. He tries to touch her by giving various reasons, and Saori's friend Mura-chan becomes suspicious of Kura's lady-killer ways. Before long, Saori realizes Kura's true nature..!?
